thread.title: Hornets top Paul-less Clippers 106-94 in China game
thread.title_full: Hornets top Paul-less Clippers 106-94 in China game

title: Hornets top Paul-less Clippers 106-94 in China game
text: Hornets top Paul-less Clippers 106-94 in China game Sunday, 11 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) SHENZHEN, China (AP) Cody Zeller and Jeremy Lin each scored 16 points to lead seven Charlotte players who reached double digits as the Hornets topped the Los Angeles Clippers 106-94 on Sunday in the first of two preseason NBA games between the teams in China. Clippers point guard Chris Paul sat out with an injured finger.
